name: Normal Everyday Things
description:
... Good morning.

Brush your teeth.

Eat breakfast.

Check your email.

Feed your fish.

Go to work.

... Later that day.

Avoid eye contact.

... Good night.

Controls:

WASD / Left-Stick - Move

Right-Click / A- Interact

Made by STICKY BISCUITS for GGJ2017! We are:
